pr_title: HBASE-23983 Fixed Spotbugs complaint in RegionStates related to ignored return value

timeline.message: HBASE-23983 Fixed Spotbugs complaint in RegionStates related to ignored return value

timeline.bodyText:
This is not correct, if there is no value yet putIfAbsent will returns null...
And here I think we could add an assert, that putIfAbsent should always return null, and then return the node above.
timeline.author: Apache9

replies.author: mwkang

replies.bodyText: I'm fine with using put, as there is a lock here...
replies.author: Apache9
